definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to be stranded (of ship)/to run aground/fig. to run into difficulties and stop
to put down the pen/to stop writing
to run aground in mid-course/to run into difficulty and stop
variant of 耽擱|耽搁[dan1 ge5]

sentences.english: You hop into your car, but, wait, where are the keys?
sentences.chinese: 你已坐進車裏準備開車，等會兒，鑰匙擱哪兒了？

sentences.english: Pay attention to what you're doing as you place your glasses on the end table.
sentences.chinese: 把注意力放在你把眼鏡擱桌子上時正在做的事情上。

sentences.english: Just stick your thumbs in your mouths, curl up into little balls and deal with it.
sentences.chinese: 咱們把大拇指擱嘴裏，蜷成一團伏低做小不就結了嘛。

sentences.english: Put the chair in the bedroom.
The entire Chinese puts here to speak is purely jokes?
sentences.chinese: 整漢語擱這裏發言純屬逗悶子吧？

sentences.english: Do you know where I put my glasses?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我把眼鏡擱哪兒了嗎？

sentences.english: The opening up accelerates the economy development of our country.
sentences.chinese: 對於外啓擱加速了人國經濟收展的法度。

sentences.english: Each chair comes with a removable full width footrest.
sentences.chinese: 每個座椅帶有一個可移動的寬度擱腳板。

sentences.english: The paper mainly analyzes the special usage of the word "Ge" in Yingshang dialect.
sentences.chinese: 主要分析了“擱”字在潁上方言中的特殊用法。

sentences.english: Put just a little salt in the soup.
Say, where to put dig down soil and rock?
sentences.chinese: 再說，往哪兒擱挖下來的土和石頭？

sentences.english: He puts down the jar and crouches to retie it.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲下來，把罐子擱地上，動手繫鞋帶。

definition: to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
